titleStmt.title: A discovery of truth and falshood discovered by the light of God in the inward parts the spirit of man being the candle of the Lord ... / written ... by one whom the people of the world calls a Quaker ... Yorkshire, 1652, Rich. Farneworth.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
